overview: Kevin Barnes, V.P Engineering and Founder of Photometria, has over 19 years of experience in software engineering and architecting large scale software systems. He has been part of five startups before Photometria and brings in a wealth of experience working with a small group of engineers in various capacities â€“ as a programmer, a system architect, Director of Engineering, Vice President of Application Architecture, and Vice President of IT. Of these five companies four were acquired by large companies (HP, Global Crossing, Juniper Networks, and Red Prairie). Until recently Kevin served as the Director of Engineering at StorePerform Technologies.
